alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 11:24AM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 3.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 3.6 Thu 5 am CDT 4.0 4.0 4.0 &&
